name: oO
description:
"oO" is a hardcore minimal "dodge-em-up / runner" arcade game.

You can try it by playing an earlier version on Kongregate for free: http://www.kongregate.com/games/targaciej/oo .
This one has updated graphics, better performance, bug fixes. By buying it you give me an opportunity to create more games.

Thank you for your support!

Maciej Targoni
